column4: i (re)moved the /etc/apache2 directory because I want to reconfigure it. However, reinstalling the 'apache2' package (or a dpkg-reconfigure), does not seem to put a new /etc/apache2 directory into place. Any ideas on this?
purge and reinstall whatever package you get from the output of: apt-cache search -n apache common
actually, just install apache2 after you purge the above
